description: Sermones duo (Venice, 1833), by John of Odzun, in 125 pdf pages. Classical Armenian text with facing Latin translation by Jean-Baptiste Aucher (Mkrtich' Awgerean). File size: 3 MB. Joannis philosophi catholici armenorum Ozniensis Oratio contra Phantasticos
